name: Oat and Honey Soap
description: This bar is heavenly and amazing for your skin. Made from local honey and organic oats, these ingredients will soothe, nourish and moisturize your skin. The oats offer a gentle scrub, calm down problem skin and feed the skin vital nutrients and anti-oxidants which help the skin retain it's youthful glow. The honey nourishes and moisturizes. Your skin will feel amazing after using this bar <3 We hope you enjoy this soap as much as we do! Ingredients: Saponofied Olive Oil*, Coconut Oil*, Safflower Oil*, Shea Nut Oil*, Camelina Oil*, Oats*, Honey *Indicates certified Organic This posting is for one 2oz. bar. Weight may vary slightly from bar to bar as they are handcrafted in small batches and hand cut, which makes each bar completely unique! The herbs, oils clays and essential oils are the highest quality and specifically chosen for their health benefits to the body. Free of harsh detergents, dyes and synthetic fragrance these are the purest and most beneficial soaps you can buy. Our bars are hand cut so each bar is completely unique! We’re confident that you’ll love our soaps! Great for gifts or for yourself. Product can be special ordered in different sizes/quantities. Please allow 4-6 weeks for curing process. . Shop Info: Organic Completely cruelty free No sulfates, phthalates or parabens…ever No synthetic dyes or fragrances Completely all natural and safe Zero waste company Packaging upcycled when possible Everything is made with love <3
